name: Escape the Plate
description: Ingredients in a kitchen all share the same fate ̶ to be eaten or thrown away. In Escape the Plate, an improvised band of food attempt to defy this fate, and must escape the restaurant they are held in. Navigate killer kitchens and deadly dining rooms to reach freedom, while avoiding chefs, servers, and bartenders who can put a stop to their escape. Explore a variety of culinary establishments across various settings including Japanese Sushi and Grill, Italian Trattorias, and Noodle Houses
